00026 void TTEOutput::initialize()
00027 {
00028     cGate *physOutGate = getParentModule()->getSubmodule("mac")->gate("phys$o");
00029     outChannel = physOutGate->findTransmissionChannel();
00030 
00031     ttQueueLengthSignal = registerSignal("ttQueueLength");
00032     beQueueLengthSignal = registerSignal("beQueueLength");
00033 }
00034 
00035 void TTEOutput::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00036 {
00037     if (msg->arrivedOn("TTin"))
00038     {
00039         //TODO THIS ASSERT IS ONLY FOR DEBUGGING PURPOSES! Later it might be allowed to queue TTframes!?!?
00040         ASSERT(framesRequested > 0);
00041         ASSERT(framesRequested == 1);
00042         //TODO Hier überprüfen ob das so ok ist, insbesondere müssen die Buffer auch "leere" messages schicken damit der Buffer weiter gesetzt wird!
00043         ttBuffersPos = (++ttBuffersPos % ttBuffers.size());
00044 
00045         //If we have an empty message allow other frame to be sent
00046         if (dynamic_cast<TTBufferEmpty *> (msg))
00047         {
00048             if (framesRequested)
00049             {
00050                 framesRequested--;
00051                 requestPacket();
00052             }
00053             delete msg;
00054         }
00055         //Else send frame
00056         else
00057         {
00058             if (framesRequested)
00059             {
00060                 framesRequested--;
00061                 send(msg, gateBaseId("out"));
00062             }
00063             else
00064             {
00065                 ttQueue.insert(msg);
00066                 emit(ttQueueLengthSignal, ttQueue.length());
00067             }
00068         }
00069     }
00070     else if (msg->arrivedOn("RCin"))
00071     {
00072         if (framesRequested && isTransmissionAllowed((EtherFrame*) msg))
00073         {
00074             framesRequested--;
00075 
00076             //Reset Bag
00077             RCBuffer *rcBuffer = dynamic_cast<RCBuffer*> (msg->getSenderModule());
00078             if (rcBuffer)
00079                 rcBuffer->resetBag();
00080             send(msg, gateBaseId("out"));
00081         }
00082         else
00083         {
00084             int priority = msg->getSenderModule()->par("priority").longValue();
00085             if (priority > 0 && priority < NUM_RC_PRIORITIES)
00086             {
00087                 rcQueue[priority].insert(msg);
00088             }
00089             else
00090             {
00091                 rcQueue[0].insert(msg);
00092                 ev << "Priority missing!" << endl;
00093             }
00094         }
00095     }
00096     //Frames arrived on in are best-effort frames
00097     else if (msg->arrivedOn("in"))
00098     {
00099         // If there are framesRequested the MAC layer is currently idle
00100         if (framesRequested && isTransmissionAllowed((EtherFrame*) msg))
00101         {
00102             framesRequested--;
00103             send(msg, gateBaseId("out"));
00104         }
00105         else
00106         {
00107             beQueue.insert(msg);
00108             emit(beQueueLengthSignal, beQueue.length());
00109         }
00110     }
00111 }
00112 
00113 void TTEOutput::registerTTBuffer(TTBuffer *ttBuffer)
00114 {
00115     Enter_Method("registerTTBuffer(%s)", ttBuffer->getName());
00116     int sendWindowStart = ttBuffer->par("sendWindowStart");
00117     for (std::vector<TTBuffer*>::iterator buffer = ttBuffers.begin(); buffer != ttBuffers.end();)
00118     {
00119         ++buffer;
00120         if (buffer == ttBuffers.end() || (*buffer)->par("sendWindowStart").longValue() > sendWindowStart)
00121         {
00122             ttBuffers.insert(buffer, ttBuffer);
00123             //Now doublecheck that the schedule is not overlapping for this port
00124             for (std::vector<TTBuffer*>::iterator buffer2 = ttBuffers.begin(); buffer2 != ttBuffers.end();)
00125             {
00126                 Buffer *tmpBuffer = *buffer2;
00127                 ++buffer2;
00128                 if (buffer2 != ttBuffers.end() && (tmpBuffer->par("sendWindowEnd").longValue() > (*buffer2)->par(
00129                         "sendWindowStart").longValue()))
00130                 {
00131                     opp_error("Port cannot be scheduled due to overlapping schedules: %s and %s", tmpBuffer->getName(),
00132                             (*buffer2)->getName());
00133                 }
00134             }
00135             return;
00136         }
00137     }
00138     //This should only happen if buffer was empty
00139     ttBuffers.push_back(ttBuffer);
00140 }
00141 
00142 void TTEOutput::finish()
00143 {
00144     ttQueue.clear();
00145     for (int i = 0; i < NUM_RC_PRIORITIES; i++)
00146     {
00147         rcQueue[i].clear();
00148     }
00149     beQueue.clear();
00150 }
00151 
00152 void TTEOutput::requestPacket()
00153 {
00154     Enter_Method("requestPacket()");
00155     //Feed the MAC layer with the next frame
00156     framesRequested++;
00157 
00158     //TTFrames
00159     if (!ttQueue.isEmpty())
00160     {
00161         framesRequested--;
00162         cMessage *msg = (cMessage*) ttQueue.pop();
00163         emit(ttQueueLengthSignal, ttQueue.length());
00164 
00165         //TODO Update buffers:
00166         ttBuffersPos = (ttBuffersPos + 1) % ttBuffers.size();
00167 
00168         send(msg, gateBaseId("out"));
00169         return;
00170     }
00171     //RCFrames
00172     for (int i = 0; i < NUM_RC_PRIORITIES; i++)
00173     {
00174         if (!rcQueue[i].isEmpty() && isTransmissionAllowed((EtherFrame*) rcQueue[i].front()))
00175         {
00176             framesRequested--;
00177             EtherFrame *message = (EtherFrame*) rcQueue[i].pop();
00178             //Reset Bag
00179             RCBuffer *rcBuffer = dynamic_cast<RCBuffer*> (message->getSenderModule());
00180             if (rcBuffer)
00181                 rcBuffer->resetBag();
00182             send(message, gateBaseId("out"));
00183             return;
00184         }
00185     }
00186     //BEFrames
00187     if (!beQueue.isEmpty() && isTransmissionAllowed((EtherFrame*) beQueue.front()))
00188     {
00189         framesRequested--;
00190         send((cMessage*) beQueue.pop(), gateBaseId("out"));
00191         emit(beQueueLengthSignal, beQueue.length());
00192         return;
00193     }
00194 }
00195 
00196 bool TTEOutput::isTransmissionAllowed(EtherFrame *message)
00197 {
00198     if (!outChannel)
00199     {
00200         return false;
00201     }
00202     //If there are no ttBuffers everything is fine
00203     if (ttBuffers.size() == 0)
00204     {
00205         return true;
00206     }
00207     TTEScheduler *scheduler = (TTEScheduler*) getParentModule()->getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler");
00208     //SimTime sendTime = (message->getBitLength()+INTERFRAME_GAP_BITS)/txRate;
00209     SimTime sendTime = outChannel->calculateDuration(message);
00210     //Don't know if that is right, but it works!
00211     sendTime += (INTERFRAME_GAP_BITS + ((PREAMBLE_BYTES + SFD_BYTES) * 8)) / outChannel->getNominalDatarate();
00212     unsigned long sendTicks = ceil((sendTime / scheduler->par("tick")).dbl());
00213     unsigned long startTicks = ttBuffers[ttBuffersPos]->par("sendWindowStart").longValue();
00214     unsigned long endTicks = ttBuffers[ttBuffersPos]->par("sendWindowEnd").longValue();
00215 
00216     //Send Window Start is in next cycle
00217     if (scheduler->getTicks() > startTicks)
00218     {
00219         startTicks += scheduler->par("cycle_ticks").longValue();
00220         endTicks += scheduler->par("cycle_ticks").longValue();
00221     }
00222     //Send Window End is in next cycle
00223     else if (scheduler->getTicks() > endTicks)
00224     {
00225         endTicks += scheduler->par("cycle_ticks").longValue();
00226     }
00227 
00228     //TODO: Perhaps more complex calculations needed?
00229     if ((scheduler->getTicks() + sendTicks) >= startTicks)
00230     {
00231         ev << "transmission not allowed!" << endl;
00232         return false;
00233     }
00234     return true;
00235 }
00236 
00237 int TTEOutput::getNumPendingRequests()
00238 {
00239     return framesRequested;
00240 }
00241 
00242 bool TTEOutput::isEmpty()
00243 {
00244     bool empty = true;
00245     empty &= ttQueue.isEmpty();
00246     for (int i = 0; i < NUM_RC_PRIORITIES; i++)
00247     {
00248         empty &= rcQueue[i].isEmpty();
00249     }
00250     empty &= beQueue.isEmpty();
00251     return empty;
00252 }
00253 void TTEOutput::clear()
00254 {
00255     beQueue.clear();
00256     for (int i = 0; i < NUM_RC_PRIORITIES; i++)
00257     {
00258         rcQueue[i].clear();
00259     }
00260     ttQueue.clear();
00261 }
